name: en
site_keywords: gender gap in Wikipedia, gender statistics in wikis, gender equality, female representation in Wikiquote, gender analysis, WikiPeopleStats, diversity statistics in Wikisource, women in collaborative platforms, gender analysis in Wikipedia, diversity in wiki projects
site_description: WikiPeopleStats is a tool for measuring the gender gap in wikis such as Wikipedia, Wikiquote, and Wikisource. Discover statistics on gender representation and promote equality.
license_info: All content is under CC BY-SA.
main_home_content: The tool allows users to track and analyze gender representation in %s.
main_user_content: You are tracking the contributions of %s in the Wikipedia articles for the project %s. This tool stores data on contributions and helps uncover trends, fostering more inclusive content over time.
homepage_global_stats_credits: These statistics are from all wikipedias.
coming_soon_tracking_wiki: This wiki has not yet been tracked by our system and the data will be available soon.
cached_version_message: This is a cached version valid until %s
cache_update_message: The cached version will update upon page reload
cache_purge_failed: Failed to purge cache. Please try again.
wikimedia_chapters_trust_tool: Wikimedia chapters on this list trust and use the tool
comparison_wiki_description: Explore how men and women are represented in both wikis.
migration_db_notice: Our statistics are currently unavailable due to a database migration. We will notify you once the process is complete.
